nodes.text: "The Search for Kaz" is an animated short that is part of the first season of Star Wars Resistance. It was released on the Disney Channel's YouTube channel on December 10, 2018, and is the first of twelve shorts.
BB-8 goes on an adventure and tries to find Kaz!

In his repair shop, Jarek Yeager, working on a targeting computer, asks BB-8 to find Kazuda Xiono, who is absent, because Yeager wants to show him how to work on the computer. BB-8, in search, goes to the Colossus marketplace, where he encounters a Voorpak and nearly gets underfoot of Bolza Grool, but doesn't find Kaz. The Voorpak follows BB-8 to Aunt Z's Tavern, where the proprietor says she hasn't seen "Mr. Bigshot" today. BB-8 eventually returns to the repair shop, where he finds Kaz working on the targeting computer. Kaz, wondering where BB-8 was, asks him to go looking for Yeager, who isn't there, prompting BB-8 to let his head fall to the floor in exasperation.
